snippet.title: Little Johnny
snippet.description:
Little Johnny (@IamLittleJohnny) For soooo many years there have been jokes about “Little Johnny.” I'm setting the record straight for all Little Johnnies. Joined twitter: July 29th, 2010 Web: http://t.co/zk4kym8qvE
698 followers
1,857 following
3,708 updates
